note Module¶

class notable.core.note.Note(dir, ext, edt, **rst)[source]¶
delete(name)[source]¶

Deletes a Note.

edit(name, content)[source]¶

Edits a Note, and if it does not exist it will make a new note with the content.

exists(name)[source]¶
get(name)[source]¶

Returns the contents of the name Note.

list()[source]¶

List should display the name of all Notes. !!! TODO: We should return (optionally ?) as a list.

new(name, content='')[source]¶
open(name, editor=None)[source]¶
